group_1.textRight: For now, the costume in this picture... how is it?

group_1.textLeft: It's decided...
[chara:301901:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Once again you've found it!!

group_1.textRight: Then you like it...?

group_1.textLeft: Of course I do!
This costume is perfect for my dream double act@comedy!

group_1.textRight: Then that's good...

group_1.textLeft: Well then, as thanks I'll think about something for@Shizuku!

group_1.textRight: My normal clothes are fine.

group_1.textLeft: No way no way! If you go in plain clothes you won't@stand out!
...Now then, do you have anything you hope for?

group_1.textRight: Even if you say hope...
(If I give a half-assed answer, I'll probably have to@wear a flashy costume...)
(Here, I'll tell her to keep it reserved.)
The colors, I'm wondering if we could have them@not be flashy.

group_1.textLeft: Hm hm...

group_1.textRight: The appearance too, shouldn't be gathering too@much attention.
Ah, and I may want a pocket, too.

group_1.textLeft: Pocket?

group_1.textRight: It would be strange to bring an ordinary bag full of@costumes.
Instead, I can put my wallet in there as well.

group_1.textLeft: I see...
Then then, Shizuku's costume to wear on that day@is...
This one!!

group_1.textRight: Th-this?@In this photo, Mami's costume?

group_1.textLeft: Yup!

group_1.textRight: I think it's cute, but... can you tell me the reason?

group_1.textLeft: First off, the color, you see, it's a good choice for@looking quiet!

group_1.textRight: Is red, really quiet...?
By the way, Ayaka, what is a flashy color to you?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... vivid pink and metallic silver maybe?

group_1.textRight: So that's it...
(I'm glad I made a reserved request, then...)

group_1.textLeft: And also, so you don't get too much attention, it has@a hood!

group_1.textRight: (This appearance won't change even if worn...)

group_1.textLeft: And to meet the last request...
Here! You can have a basket without feeling out of@place!

group_1.textRight: You mean to put my wallet in it?
There would be a lot of leftover space, though...

group_1.textLeft: It's fine, it's fine!@A public relations person said...
On the day of the event, sweets would be given out.
With this basket, couldn't Shizuku also participate@as staff?
Then, I can participate in the event on the side of@the stage!

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
(I just need to be honest, but...@Well, isn't it fine if it's cute?)
Thank you, Ayaka.
How was it?! Our double act comedy?

group_1.textLeft: Ahh... well, that kind of thing, I have to think about.
Right? Ikumi?
Y-yeah!
It was cute and gave me a good feeling!
Putting that aside, would you two let me take a@picture?

group_1.textRight: Of course, we promised.

group_1.textCenter: To be honest, I don't really know anything about@comedy, but...
The two of you, have happy faces.
